body: @Kirby Cosmico I actually rather like lemons, so if life gave ME lemons I would say thank you for those lemons life but I still don't forgive you for that time you made me fall into a freezing lake that wasn't cool ok, a bag of lemons isn't enough to make up for that. But I would be grateful for the lemons and make some nice lemon infused water to drink. But if life gave me lolis... well now... then life would definitely be forgiven by me, with a glass of fresh lolionade in hand I really don't think there's anyone I wouldn't forgive.
Dam those are some cute lolis, shame he didn't get to keep em 😕. Still this is fantastic 8.5/10.
Ultimate Gacha power indeed, There part 2 of this (C93) [Fuka Fuka (Sekiya Asami)] Ultimate Rare!+
I need this game. The gacha power to summon cute UR loli girls is a big improvement to the society
0.5% is actually quite good rate for this haha
I need to find this game.

I don't think its any specific game.  Japanese mobile games in general are known for their "gatcha" or lottery mechanics.  They usually have disgusting draw rates.  During a New Years event in granblue fantasy last year, some guy spent over 6k to get a specific character :P
What is this app? I have seen this story type in a few hentai recently.
when life give you lemon you make lolinade

Poor guy...this app is only for dudes who dont have any social skills.....

(hmmmmm....)
Mobile Japanese games...  Guess they really do suck you dry
